item.title: AI Assistant vs Digital Human
item.description: AI assistants and digital humans both offer virtual assistance, but they differ in their core functionalities and capabilities. Digital human has human like appearance, AI assistant do not have appearance. Digital human are expected to have better in social interaction and emotional intelligence

item.title: Security Framework for GenAI
item.description: Security frameowrk for genAI has 3 important components 1. Identify ttack surface area 2. Secure attack surface 3. Create a security Plan. Read details of these 3 components
